1.content:
Tails have finished creating the machine. All his life he was told that he was too young to do sexual stuff or adult things.

But he was tired of things things their way. He was older enough so he looks at the device with a smirk and left the laboratory. He knew all the females he was friends with were old enough to do their own things without having people tell them what to do. So he decided to use his machine to BE them. So he left his lab and began to walk to...
1.title: The plan begins

12.content: The streets were empty since it was night but you could make out a figure walking as well. You get a bit closer and smirk widely as you realize that the figure is none other than...
12.title: You notice someone walking nearby

info.brief_description: After being told many that he was still to young to love he decides to get things his way
info.description:
After being told many times that he was still to young to love Tails, decides to do things his own way and built a machine that allows him to take over the body of a female in close range. Will he succeed? Or will it go wrong?

Ways that can be used:
-Bodysuit
-Mind transfer
-and More(You decide!)

Rules:
Don't kill Tails.
Lesbian stuff is allowed but don't exaggerate.
Don't make any chapter that ends a part of a story. If that happens then I will delete it.
Have fun
